Drink Up! 15 Good Ideas for Beer and Wine

The Kitchn's Best of 2014
Why Chilling Your Beer Glass Isn't a Waste of Time

As we're getting ready to raise a glass to the new year, we figure it's a perfect time to look back at all the great beer and wine ideas and information we shared in 2014.

Whether you prefer a crisp white, a full-bodied red, or a hoppy IPA, we can help you become a more informed (and satisfied) drinker.
